scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names docker,===api,===www --prefix-colors yellow,magenta,blue 'yarn workspace api start:db' 'yarn workspace api dev' 'yarn workspace www dev'
scripts.test: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names ===api,===www --prefix-colors magenta,blue 'yarn workspace api test' 'yarn workspace www test'
scripts.eslint: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names ===api,===www --prefix-colors magenta,blue 'yarn workspace api eslint' 'yarn workspace www eslint'
scripts.build: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names ===api,===www --prefix-colors magenta,blue 'yarn workspace api build' 'yarn workspace www build'
